articles.content: A US property developer that owns studios where films including Gone with the Wind and TV shows such as The Sopranos were filmed is investing £300m to build a Hollywood-style production complex in Da… [+2310 chars]

articles.author: By Ciara Farmer For Mailonline
articles.title: Susanna Reid is forced to placate Piers Morgan and Charlotte Hawkins as they engage in war of words - Daily Mail
articles.description: The journalist, 55, took a number of swipes at the news presenter, 45, before their co-star Susanna, 49, urging them to 'calm down
articles.content:
Good Morning Britain stars Piers Morgan and Charlotte Hawkins became locked in a feud on Tuesday morning, leaving their co-star Susanna Reid acting as referee.
